query:
SELECT l.id, l.title, l.contentType, l.courseId, c.slug as courseSlug, COUNT(q.id) as questionCount
FROM lessons l
JOIN courses c ON c.id = l.courseId
LEFT JOIN quiz_questions q ON q.lessonId = l.id
WHERE l.contentType = 'quiz'
GROUP BY l.id, l.title, l.contentType, l.courseId, c.slug
HAVING questionCount > 0
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute SELECT l.id, l.title, l.contentType, l.courseId, c.slug as courseSlug, COUNT(q.id) as questionCount
FROM lessons l
JOIN courses c ON c.id = l.courseId
LEFT JOIN quiz_questions q ON q.lessonId = l.id
WHERE l.contentType = 'quiz'
GROUP BY l.id, l.title, l.contentType, l.courseId, c.slug
HAVING questionCount > 0
LIMIT 5;
